content: शारद {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [शरदि भवं अण्] {@--1@} Belonging to autumn, autumnal; (the {%<ab>f.</ab>%} is शारदी in this sense); विमलशारदचंदिरचंद्रिका <ls>Bv. 1. 113</ls>; <ls>R. 10. 9</ls>; <ls>Ms. 6. 11</ls>; मेघः शारद एव काशघवलः पानीयरिक्तोदरः <ls>Subhāṣ.</ls> {@--2@} Annual. {@--3@} New, recent. {@--4@} Young, fresh. {@--5@} Modest, shy, bashful. {@--6@} Diffident, not bold. --दः {@--1@} A year. {@--2@} An autumnal sickness. {@--3@} Autumnal sunshine. {@--4@} A kind of kidney-bean. {@--5@} The Bakula tree. --दी The full-moon day in the month of Kārtika. --दं {@--1@} Corn, grain. {@--2@} The white lotus. --दा {@--1@} A kind of Vīṇā or lute. {@--2@} <ab>N.</ab> of Durgā. {@--3@} Of Sarasvatī; ( शरत्काले पुरा यस्मान्नवम्यां बोधिता सुरैः . शारदा सा समाख्याता पींठे लोके च नामतः).
